message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity that I think you'll love. I'm willing to start at $15000 for the product.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a more reasonable price, but I have to consider my own costs and value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm now offering the product to you for $13500.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $11000, but I think that's the highest I can go. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.

I appreciate your willingness to go up to $11000, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you at $12000, but I'm not going any lower. This is my final offer on the product.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $11500, and that's as low as I can go. I hope we can find a way to make this work.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $11500, Bob. However, I still need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get at least $13000 for the product. I'm offering it to you for $12500. This is my last offer.
